text: so I got back really late last night it
was probably like 1:30 or so and what
happened was I left Lisa to find a
couple of my other friends but he didn't
have a phone on me and for some reason I
told myself with people to find them
anyways and so I went to the Sam Smith
stage to try to find them and of course
there's like a few thousand people there
and it was impossible to find my buddy
so I just wandered back to Lisa's
campsite to try find Lisa and then
during that time she had gone to look
for me and I didn't have a phone so
basically for the last like two hours of
the festival hour-and-a-half probably I
was just wandering trying to find
someone I knew but didn't turn out and
then I had to walk back alone but it
wasn't so bad that the actual date
itself was super fun lots of hip-hop
which in rappers so I'm not like big on
that kind of music I do appreciate some
of it but it's not exactly my favorite
music but Sam Smith was really good
chance the rapper it was good yeah
there's just a lot of cool shows and
super fun to be meeting up with my
friends haven't seen them in a long time
and now I'm walking to the car so you go
edit a photo because that's why I'm here
I just got soaked I was trying to find
the car here this is my buddy's car
super sick anyways I don't know why but
the FOB isn't working so I kept clicking
the noise button but it wouldn't make
any noise so I couldn't find it and I
was just wandering the parking lot and I
just served pouring and pouring but I
luckily found it before I drowned
